title: Naples father pleads guilty in son's shooting death
content:
NAPLES, TX (KLTV) -
A Morris County man pled guilty in the shooting death of his teen son.
According to the Morris County District Attorney's Office, Kenneth Webster Jr. pled guilty to manslaughter during a bench trial on Nov. 15.
Webster was charged in the shooting death of his son, DeAdrian Webster in October.
On Oct. 1, Naples police officers responded to a shooting in the city. When officers arrived on the scene they found one deceased male, later identified as DeAdrian Webster.
